    • Method Detail

      • buyStock

        public void buyStock​(java.lang.String symbol,
                     java.lang.String date,
                     float numberOfShares,
                     float transactionCost)
        Description copied from interface: NewModel
        This method is used to buy a stock and add it to this user's active portfolio. A flexible portfolio contains a hashmap which stores all these stocks. To add a stock to the portfolio user needs to enter Stock Symbol, number of shares he wants, date on which he wants and the transaction cost associated with it.
        Specified by:
        buyStock in interface NewModel
        Parameters:
        symbol - String which should be a valid.
        date - LocalDate date on which he wants to purchase.
        numberOfShares - float which is the number of shares the user wants of that company.
        transactionCost - float which is transaction associated for this transaction.

      • sellStock

        public void sellStock​(java.lang.String symbol,
                      java.lang.String date,
                      float numberOfShares,
                      float transactionCost)
        Description copied from interface: NewModel
        This method is used to sell a stock from user's active portfolio. It checks if it is possible to sell the stocks and sells them only if it is possible. To sell a stock from a portfolio user needs to enter Stock Symbol, number of shares he wants, date on which he wants to sell and the transaction cost associated with it.
        Specified by:
        sellStock in interface NewModel
        Parameters:
        symbol - String which should be a valid.
        date - LocalDate date on which he wants to sell.
        numberOfShares - float which is the number of shares the user wants to sell.
        transactionCost - float which is transaction associated for this transaction.

      • getPlot

        public java.lang.StringBuilder getPlot​(java.lang.String startDate,
                                       java.lang.String endDate,
                                       ApiType apiType)
        Description copied from interface: NewModel
        This method tell the user how a particular portfolio has performed over a period of time using a line chart by taking date ranges in which he wants to see the performance.
        Specified by:
        getPlot in interface NewModel
        Parameters:
        startDate - LocalDate start date of the range.
        endDate - LocalDate end date of the range.
        apiType - ApiType used determine which third party api is to be called.
        Returns:
        plot showing the performance of the portfolio.

      • getComposition

        public java.lang.StringBuilder getComposition​(java.lang.String date)
        Description copied from interface: NewModel
        This method is used to get the composition of this user's active portfolio. Composition shows the symbol and number of shares of each stock in a portfolio purchased before a particular day.
        Specified by:
        getComposition in interface NewModel
        Parameters:
        date - String which is given by the user
        Returns:
        StringBuilder which has symbol and number of shares for each stock in portfolio

      • getCostBasis

        Description copied from interface: NewModel

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        date - String which is given by the user
        apiType - ApiType used determine which third party api is to be called.
        Returns:
